title: 4.19 with no Azir fixes?
body: Azir has so many issues right now and you didn't bother addressing them this patch? Yeah, I guess giving Singed art updates and QoL buffs was more important than fixing your buggy champion, Azir.

replies.body: Seriously, probably still the buggiest champion in game two patches later.

None of the confirmed bug fixes have been listed (i.e.: Anivia's Q).

Expect them to be in the patch, just undocumented.
Its funny because they said that Patch 4.19 would have a bugfix for his turret not applying penetrating rounds
